unnormalised: The transfer window is heating up! Interesting to see if ISL clubs like Mohun Bagan Super Giant will target rising stars from the Santosh Trophy. Reminds me of *Chak De! India*, scouting for hidden talent. R. Kumar's move to Chennaiyin FC for a reported Rs. 20 Lakhs is a good pickup. Will Bengaluru FC find a suitable replacement for their key midfielder who moved 500 km away to Mumbai City FC? Transfers closing on August 31st.
normalised: The transfer window is heating up! Interesting to see if I S L clubs like Mohun Bagan Super Giant will target rising stars from the Santosh Trophy. Reminds me of Chak De! India, scouting for hidden talent. R. Kumar's move to Chennaiyin F C for a reported rupee twenty lakhs is a good pickup. Will Bengaluru F C find a suitable replacement for their key midfielder who moved five hundred kilometer away to Mumbai City F C? Transfers closing on August thirty first.
